user_exists: User with same login already exists
requires_jwt: This route requires a JWT token
login_validation: The login must be 3 to 20 characters length
password_validation: The password must be 3 to 20 characters length
name_validation: The name must be 1 to 50 characters length
done_validation: The Done status must be a boolean
createdAt_validation: The CreatedAt must be a Date
filter_validation: The filter can only take 3 values (done, undone, all)
order_validation: The order can only take 2 values (asc, desc)
page_validation: The page must be an integer
pp_validation: The page size must be an integer
